definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Whsometimes should you get up tomorrow morning?
sentences.chinese: 翌日早上你希圖幾點起牀？

sentences.english: It intensified into a typhoon the next day and then headed slowly towards the north-northwest.
sentences.chinese: 它於翌日增強成爲颱風，然後緩慢地向西北偏北前進。

sentences.english: It will be on the front pages of America’s newspapers the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 這將成爲美國衆多報紙翌日一早的頭版新聞。

sentences.english: The next day, the brothers take a camel ride through the desert.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，兩兄弟還騎駱駝穿越沙漠。

sentences.english: The next day, shu mei in order to retrieve the phone, deliberately take open car back to the company.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，淑梅爲了取回手機，刻意乘坐開朗的車回公司。

sentences.english: You and two of your family members had severe stomachaches the following day.
sentences.chinese: 您和您的兩名家庭成員有嚴重肚子痛翌日。

sentences.english: The next day investors queued up to buy Freddie's bonds.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，投資人排起長龍，爭購房地美的債券。

sentences.english: The following day, Mu Du left gloomily. But at noon, he came back with smiles brimming from his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，木犢灰杳沓出門，中午返回，卻鼻裏眼裏透笑。

sentences.english: The next big belly of spring back luck, a face of tired.
sentences.chinese: 翌日腹大便便的春花回到福星高照，一臉倦容。

sentences.english: MM:I request shelter for the evening, before I continue my travels home on the morrow.
sentences.chinese: 在翌日繼續我歸鄉的旅途前，我請求今夜能得到庇護。

sentences.english: The next day Linda turn on the computer, that day has re written script for her constant.
sentences.chinese: 翌日嘉欣打開計算機，發現天恆已爲她重新撰寫講稿。

sentences.english: The next morning, the protection is still in the discussion highlights the paranormal.
sentences.chinese: 翌日早上，衆學護仍在議論拔萃的靈異遭遇。

sentences.english: The next day investors queued up to buy Freddie’s bonds.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，投資人排起長龍，爭購房地美的債券。

sentences.english: The next day, dragon sword grain is being public execution.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，刀紋龍行將被公開處決。

sentences.english: The next day, send a small in a kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 翌日，送小依上了幼兒園。

sentences.english: Their cell phone alarms rang at six the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 手機鬧鈴在翌日早上六點響起了。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
11 am-1 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
7-9 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
